name: part_000
file: tmp_【 #わため3D重大告知 】わため史上たぶん最大で最強の告知！【角巻わため⧸ホロライブ４期生】 [VYk1zdGfPzI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Intro title card with upbeat music and the text 'Major Announcement' and 'Watame called out?!'.
Tsunomaki Watame is standing in a large flower field, introducing her stream and mentioning that there will be a 'major announcement' today. She also mentions being called out by various people.
Shishiro Botan's voice is heard first, sounding like a mysterious hermit, before she appears in the flower field. They talk about Genghis Khan parties and the strange 'weather' involving grenades.

subtitles.original:
重大告知
...わため呼び出し?!
subtitles.english:
Major Announcement
...Watame called out?!

subtitles.original: みんなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: こんばんドドドー！
subtitles.english: Konban-dododo!

subtitles.original: ホロライブ4期生、角巻わためです！
subtitles.english: Hololive 4th generation, Tsunomaki Watame here!

subtitles.original: 今日はね、サムネにもあるんだけどね、
subtitles.english: Today, as you can see in the thumbnail,

subtitles.original: 重大告知がね、あるみたいで。
subtitles.english: there seems to be a major announcement.

subtitles.original: わため、
subtitles.english: Watame,

subtitles.original: わかんない、なんだろうね？
subtitles.english: doesn't know. I wonder what it is?

subtitles.original: でもね、わかんないんだけどね、その代わりに、
subtitles.english: But even though I don't know, instead,

subtitles.original: なぜか今日は色んな方から呼び出しをね、受けててさ。
subtitles.english: for some reason, I've been getting called out by various people today.

subtitles.original: しかも誰が来るか、しらー知らないんだよね！
subtitles.english: And I don't— I don't even know who's coming!

subtitles.original: 重大告知と関係あるのかね？どうなんだろうね？
subtitles.english: I wonder if it's related to the major announcement? Who knows?

subtitles.original: あ、今日はこんな感じで、まったり、のんびりやっていきますよ。
subtitles.english: Ah, today we'll be taking it easy and relaxing like this.

subtitles.original: たまにはね、3Dでのんびり配信しても悪くないよに～。
subtitles.english: Sometimes, it's not bad to have a relaxing stream in 3D~.

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、まだね、呼び出しの待ち合わせ時間までね、
subtitles.english: Wait, there's still some time before,

subtitles.original: 時間があるっぽいから、お話ししますかね、みんなと。お話ししますかね？
subtitles.english: the meeting time I was called for, so shall we chat, everyone? Shall we chat?

subtitles.original: みんな見えてる？見えてる？
subtitles.english: Can everyone see me? Can you see me?

subtitles.original: すごいね、コメントの速度すげー！みんな「ねー」って言って。
subtitles.english: Wow, the comment speed is amazing! Everyone's saying "yeah."

subtitles.original: え、なんだと思う？今日の発表、みんななんだと思う？
subtitles.english: Eh, what do you think? What do you think today's announcement is?

subtitles.original: わためわかんないんだけどさ。
subtitles.english: Watame doesn't know though.

subtitles.original: もう何がもう1ミリもわかんないんだけどさ。なんだと思う？
subtitles.english: I don't have a single clue. What do you think?

subtitles.original: 今までの角巻わため史上最大で、
subtitles.english: The biggest in Tsunomaki Watame's history,

subtitles.original: えー、なんだっけ、最高で最強な？重大告知って言ってたっけ？
subtitles.english: uh, what was it, the best and strongest? Did they call it a major announcement?

subtitles.original: 告白とか？ジンギスカンパーティー？
subtitles.english: A confession? A Genghis Khan party?

subtitles.original: え？最後の晩餐なの？今日。あれおかしいな。
subtitles.english: Eh? Is this the last supper? Today. That's strange.

subtitles.original: 恐いの。もっといいお話しだったと思うんだけどね。
subtitles.english: It's scary. I thought it was going to be better news.

subtitles.original: あ、わかんないけどね。何のことかわからんけどね。
subtitles.english: Well, I don't know. I have no idea what it's about.

subtitles.original: わためや...
subtitles.english: Watame...

subtitles.original: は！
subtitles.english: Ha!

subtitles.original: わためや...
subtitles.english: Watame...

subtitles.original: 誰だ？
subtitles.english: Who's there?

subtitles.original: ボタンちゃん... 獅白ぼたんじゃよ。
subtitles.english: It's Botan-chan... Shishiro Botan.

subtitles.original: ボタンちゃん？ え？なんか仙人みたいになってる。
subtitles.english: Botan-chan? Eh? You look like some kind of hermit.

subtitles.original: え？神様になったの？
subtitles.english: Eh? Did you become a god?

subtitles.original: 獅白ぼたんです。
subtitles.english: I'm Shishiro Botan.

subtitles.original: おら、ようこそ。
subtitles.english: Hey, welcome.

subtitles.original: 今日は私を呼び出してどうするつもりだ？
subtitles.english: What do you plan to do with me after calling me out today?

subtitles.original: パーティーか？ジンギスカンパーティーなのか？
subtitles.english: A party? Is it a Genghis Khan party?

subtitles.original: 出荷でもしようかな。
subtitles.english: Maybe I'll ship you off.

subtitles.original: ひいいい！おかしいよ！
subtitles.english: Hieeee! That's not right!

subtitles.original: 待て待て待て、こんなおどろおどろしい登場しましたけれども、まあ今日は特に何もないですよ。
subtitles.english: Wait wait wait, you made such a creepy entrance, but there's nothing special going on today.

subtitles.original: ほんま？
subtitles.english: Really?

subtitles.original: ほんまほんま。ただね、ちょっとね、わためとちょっとゆっくりお話ししたいなと思って、
subtitles.english: Really, really. I just wanted to have a relaxed chat with Watame,

subtitles.original: 今日はちょっとここね、わための隠れ家に遊びに来たわけですよ。
subtitles.english: so I came to visit Watame's hideout here today.

subtitles.original: あ、そうね、この場所バレちゃったからね。
subtitles.english: Ah, that's right, since this place was discovered.

subtitles.original: そう、バレちゃったからね。もう、もう道覚えちゃったからね。もう逃げれねーからな。
subtitles.english: Yeah, since it was discovered. I've already memorized the way. There's no escaping now.

subtitles.original: 怖！でも今日は何もないんだもんね？
subtitles.english: Scary! But there's nothing today, right?

subtitles.original: うん、何もない、何もない。
subtitles.english: Yeah, nothing, nothing.

subtitles.original: そう、何もない。だから今日は本当にもう...
subtitles.english: Right, nothing. So today is really just...

subtitles.original: え、何？ え？ ゆっくり... お？ 何？ え？ すごい何？ 何？
subtitles.english: Eh, what? Eh? Relaxing... Oh? What? Eh? What is that? What?

subtitles.original: ゆっくり... 何か投げた？
subtitles.english: Relaxing... Did you throw something?

subtitles.original: あ、気にしないで。今日の天気... あの、今日の天気あの、晴れ時々手榴弾だから。
subtitles.english: Ah, don't worry about it. The weather today... um, today's weather is sunny with occasional grenades.

subtitles.original: 晴れ時々手榴ー え？ お？ なんか、え？ え？
subtitles.english: Sunny with occasional gren- Eh? Oh? Something's... eh? Eh?

subtitles.original: 気にしないで。
subtitles.english: Don't worry about it.

subtitles.original: え？雨だけじゃなくて手榴弾降るなんて聞いたの？
subtitles.english: Eh? I never heard about grenades falling instead of rain.

subtitles.original: まあそんな日もあると思う。
subtitles.english: Well, I guess there are days like that.

subtitles.original: あるかな？ まあ最近ちょっと異常気象だしね。
subtitles.english: I wonder? Well, the weather has been a bit extreme lately.

subtitles.original: そうそう。
subtitles.english: True, true.
